Sentencas: The La1-xCaxFe0.8Ni0.2O3- (0 x 0.9) system is investigated for potential application as a cathode material for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells (IT-SOFCs).
Titulo: The Formation of Performance Enhancing Pseudo-Composites in the Highly Active La1-xCaxFe0.8Ni0.2O3 System for IT-SOFC Application

Sentencas: A broad range of experimental techniques have been utilized in order to elucidate the characteristics of the entire compositional range.
Titulo: The Formation of Performance Enhancing Pseudo-Composites in the Highly Active La1-xCaxFe0.8Ni0.2O3 System for IT-SOFC Application

Sentencas: Low A-site Ca content compositions (x 0.4) feature a single perovskite solid solution.
Titulo: The Formation of Performance Enhancing Pseudo-Composites in the Highly Active La1-xCaxFe0.8Ni0.2O3 System for IT-SOFC Application

Sentencas: Compositions with 40% Ca content (x = 0.4) exhibit the highest electrical and ionic conductivities of these single phase materials (250 and 1.9 x 10(-3) S cm(-1) at 800 degrees C, respectively), a level competitive with state-of-the-art (La,Sr)(Fe,Co)O-3.
Titulo: The Formation of Performance Enhancing Pseudo-Composites in the Highly Active La1-xCaxFe0.8Ni0.2O3 System for IT-SOFC Application

Sentencas: Between 40 and 50% Ca content (0.4 > x > 0.5) a solubility limit is reached and a secondary, brownmillerite-type phase appears for all higher Ca content compositions (0.5 x 0.9).
Titulo: The Formation of Performance Enhancing Pseudo-Composites in the Highly Active La1-xCaxFe0.8Ni0.2O3 System for IT-SOFC Application

Sentencas: While typically seen as detrimental to electrochemical performance in cathode materials, this phase brings with it ionic conductivity at operational temperatures.
Titulo: The Formation of Performance Enhancing Pseudo-Composites in the Highly Active La1-xCaxFe0.8Ni0.2O3 System for IT-SOFC Application

Sentencas: This gives rise to the effective formation of pseudo-composite materials which feature significantly enhanced performance characteristics, while also providing the closest match in thermal expansion behavior to typical electrolyte materials.
Titulo: The Formation of Performance Enhancing Pseudo-Composites in the Highly Active La1-xCaxFe0.8Ni0.2O3 System for IT-SOFC Application

Sentencas: This all comes with the advantage of being produced through a simple, single-step, low-cost production route without the issues associated with typical composite materials.
Titulo: The Formation of Performance Enhancing Pseudo-Composites in the Highly Active La1-xCaxFe0.8Ni0.2O3 System for IT-SOFC Application

Sentencas: The highest performing pseudo-composite material (x = 0.5) exhibits electronic conductivity of 300-350 S cm(-1) in the 600-800 degrees C temperature range while the best polarisation resistance (R-p) values of approximately 0.2 cm(2) are found in the 0.5 x 0.7 range.
Titulo: The Formation of Performance Enhancing Pseudo-Composites in the Highly Active La1-xCaxFe0.8Ni0.2O3 System for IT-SOFC Application
